website_summaries.verdict: The Yamaha EPH-30 Inner Ear Headphones are a fantastic option for anyone on a budget, offering sound quality on par with the sound of sets that cost at least twice as much.
pros: The Yamaha EPH-30 Inner Ear Headphones offer surprisingly good sound quality for the money
They're  comfortable and provide some passive noise isolation
cons: The Yamaha EPH-30 headphones seem pretty fragile
and the white version gets dirty fast

customer_reviews.title: Finally - Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Went through several 'quality name-brand' sets that were worthless for the price before finding these. Very comfortable and very nice sound reproduction. Some out there don't understand why the right ear-bud has a longer lead cord than the left. The right ear-bud wraps BEHIND your neck. Some of us don't like having cords dangling down both sides of our face. If that's you, these are the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked out perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery of the short/long lines to the earbuds but this has worked out great. I can word in the yard, workout, or whatever and there is no interference between the cords and whatever my hands are doing because the cords go down my back instead of hanging out front. The tone is very good and the middle sized earbuds fit better than any other that I have tried. If I loose these I would definitely buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Bumpin!
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews and decided to get them for my wife The clarity and bass is f***ing awesome! for only 40 bucks u cant go wrong! ill be getting myself a pair as well!
customer_reviews.author: Bass Head

customer_reviews.title: Not that great...
customer_reviews.text: Using both sizes of adapters in the ear, they both slip out of place. After a year of usage I'd rather look to another brand / model.
customer_reviews.author: Jardy

customer_reviews.title: Good sound - Fragile
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound fantastic for the price; most noticeably they can produce a nice degree of bass, something which most sub-$50 seem to totally miss. However they do feel pretty fragile and are prone to tangling. The cable for the right earphone is also longer, designed to go over the shoulder from the left side and some may not like this style though it seems better for running, exercise etc.
customer_reviews.author: soup

customer_reviews.title: Great Earphones for Noise Reduction
customer_reviews.text: Finally on an airplane i can actually understand what is being said on a movie or tv show. They send different sizes of earplugs that fit on the speakers for a snug fit. Quality of sound is above average and much better than standard iphone speakers. Bought a second as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: mschroed

customer_reviews.title: And you can wash them in your washing machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been enjoying these headphones for a couple of years. Thought they were dead last night when my wife found them in the bottom of the washing machine. She had washed my work jeans which had these in my pocket. Figured I would be back to buy a new pair. However, I tried them and they still work perfectly!! Amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D. Tyree

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat annoying
customer_reviews.text: Good quality ear buds. Nice fit and sound quality, don't like the different length cords though. If you wear them in front one hangs really low and looks dumb, loop it behind your head and it snags on your collar or hoody restricting head movement.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Sword

customer_reviews.title: these r great headphones for the money $40 bucks
customer_reviews.text: these r great headphones for the money $40 bucks . I don't own any high end headphones but have tested them their all new names in the headphone era (((overrated)) . YAMAHA has been around since the beginning of music.
customer_reviews.author: miguelo

customer_reviews.title: Great buds
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great sound quality. The only downside is I don't like when one side's cord is longer than the other which these are, but not a huge deal
customer_reviews.author: Katie

product_meta.title: Yamaha EPH-30WH In-Ear Headphones (White)
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingGreat sounding, efficient, very clear sound stage and great bass reproduction. WHITE

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


THE YAMAHA EPH-30 EARPHONES FEATURE COOL STYLING, EASY COMFORT, AND GREAT SOUND
Enjoy premium sound from from your MP3 player, iPod, or home stereo with maximum listening comfort, noise isolation, and high fidelity with Yamaha’s advanced in-ear headphones.  * Superior audio performance delivers deep bass, clear midrange, and crisp highs
 * Canal-type earphones isolate external ambient noise
 * Snug, comfortable fit with three ear bud sizes included
 * High efficiency to maximize MP3 player battery life
 * Rugged, durable construction
 * Available in black or white

Understanding that the ear is an instrument critically trained to demand perfection in sound reproduction, musicians know that high-quality headphones are a vital component of any music system. Yamaha's complete headphone line utilizes the latest in technology, ergonomics, and sound quality for musical applications ranging from casual listening to professional studio work. From music creation to music reproduction, Yamaha audio equipment has been recognized as an industry standard for more than 30 years. Respected professionals depend on Yamaha to help them create award-winning sound. Whether you are listening to music on the go or in the studio creating the next big hit, always demand perfection. Yamaha does. 



TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
 * Driver Type: Dynamic
 * Driver Unit: 9mm
 * Impedance: 16.0 +/-3dB
 * Frequency Range: 20Hz--21kHz
 * Cable Length: 48" (R is longer from split)
 * Plug: 3.5mm gold stereo mini
 * Included Ear Pads: 3 sizes (small, medium, large)
 * Weight: 15g (w/cable), 3g (w/o cable)
feature_bullets: Has three different size ear pads for comfort
